alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 2:47PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow and blowing snow . Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible at valley floors, and 6 to 12 inches above 7000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph at pass level. * WHERE...Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
